name: Starcats
description: Cooperation is a strategy, not a requirement. Make temporary allies, break promises, and watch out for backstabbers in Starcats, a local party game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480, or faster DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
